========================
PyNN 0.9.5 release notes
========================

December 5th 2019

Welcome to PyNN 0.9.5!


NEST 2.18.0
-----------

PyNN now supports the latest version of NEST.


Bug fixes
---------

A `small number of bugs`_ have been fixed.

.. _`small number of bugs`: https://github.com/NeuralEnsemble/PyNN/issues?q=milestone%3A0.9.5+is%3Aclosed
